item.title: Learn Python By Projects
item.description:
‚úÖ LEVEL 0 ‚Äî ABSOLUTE BEGINNER (Basics)

üéØ Skills Covered

Basic syntax, variables, data types, loops, conditionals, lists/tuples/sets/dicts, exceptions, functions, modules. *(From roadmap: ‚ÄúLearn the Basics‚Äù, left side of page 1) *

üìå Projects

  1. Simple Calculator CLI

    • Covers: variables, conditionals, loops, functions, exceptions.

  2. Unit Converter (km ‚Üí miles, INR ‚Üí USD, etc.)

    • Covers: type casting, input/output, modules.

  3. Personal Expense Tracker (JSON-based)

    • Dicts, lists, loops, file I/O, exception handling.

  4. Mini Contact Book with Search
